Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0.2pre) Gecko/20110517 Firefox/4.0.2pre SeaMonkey/2.1.1pre
and the Linux i686 version.

Debian GNU/Linux 6.0.x+maybe something, with GNOME. Tried with the Metacity/GTK themes "Clearlooks" and "Shiki-Colors" (Dust).

DPI is 96, fonts in GNOME are:

Application   Sans 16
Document      Sans 16
Desktop       Sans Bold 14
Window title  Sans Bold  13
Fixed width   DejaVu Sans Mono Book  16

comments.text: Firefox fixed a similar problem in Bug 415190. Our autocomplete is different but perhaps the patch there might suggest a fix for us. CC Neil

comments.raw_text:
Hi, yes, I still can reproduce it with Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:16.0) Gecko/16.0 Firefox/16.0 SeaMonkey/2.13a1  20120624.

I am using Xfce4 with the Shiki-Dust theme.  With font size 14, it wasn't noticeable, but with 16 yes.
